text:
Not 100% following the issue but:
you can not remove the module wrapper (which I agree will be nicer to keep everything more cleaner if we want), but add another wrapper (yuhu) to have your custom class as selector is actually, possible. Isn't it enough?
this is in the sidebar when you have selected the flex col (d&d)
it works like the col wrapping but will be used to wrap each module contained in the flex col.

idea: *Add the full features for the form field in custom modules.* If you agree please upvote this thread:
<https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/HubSpot-Ideas/Add-all-of-the-form-features-to-the-form-field-in-custom-modules/idi-p/261651#M31984>
Yea, we're not using the drag and drop in this instance, <@U22PWJ41G> is this something we can add via a parameter?

<@U2H3TT8F2> you can do it with:
`per_widget_wrapper_html`
:point_up: champion
:thinking_face:  would be neat to have a nomination process for HS champions
Agreed, I think I know of a good place where this could be promoted :wink:
good point.  i cant even imagine
I think that + performance concerns are the main reasons they haven’t made that a standard
but you have to admit there have been those times where it would have been so helpful
oh heck yea. I’m not saying it isn’t insanely useful. I’m just saying it’s like giving a 4 year old a welding torch
i was planning on giving my daughter her torch on her 5th bday
in the right hands that welding torch can do some awesome stuff. in that 4 year olds hands it can do some pretty terrifying stuff
you are saying that is a bad idea
i can see nothing going wrong :slightly_smiling_face:
she has steady hands
hahaha well. to be flat out honest I wouldn’t put it past my wife to put a welding torch in a kids hands
ha
context is key though, my wife is an engineering/tech ed teacher
noted.  ###keep child away from jon's wife###
hmmm
i will keep an eye on her
hahaha
:wink:

everyone tells us they think when we have kids they’re going to be building robots at 4 years old.
“gotta start your robot army when you’re young, no one will mess with you in middle school if you have the terminator follow you everywhere”
everyone thought our child would be lost in a forest somewhere when she turned 4
hahaha
